name: 8-Bit Breadboard Computer
description:
This is a simulation of Ben Eater's 8-Bit Breadboard computer, as seen on his Youtube Channel. It runs completely in a text based console window and allows you to edit the RAM (the running program) or the ROM (instruction codes) with an external text editor.

Note: This is not really a game but it doesn't exactly fall under the software or tool category either. Some people may find this interesting, educational or maybe even fun.

Requirements:

  • Windows 7-10 / .NET 4.5 or higher.
  • An understanding of binary numbers.
  • Lots of free time.
